title: What do you call a Japanese Aurelion Sol?

replies.body:
That is indeed the definition. "OMG Japan is so much better than 'Insert home country here' I wish I lived there instead" I mean c'mon people, love where you're from even if it's "terrible" you can strive to make it better instead of jumping ship and going to somewhere better, that's the kind of thing that could ruin the world if everyone felt the same way; just leaving when it gets bad instead of trying to make it better.


Sorry for rant, just something that Trigger(seeds) me {{champion:427}} .

Yeah, man.  I hate when people think that, because you watch anime, you're a weeaboo.  A weeaboo is someone who takes loving Japanese culture to the point of cursing their own non-Japanese heritage, not a guy who watches animated tv shows.

tbh the only thing I like about Japan is the cherry blossom trees

and I guess some of their games and anime and similar things

This joke, i got it.

It is still bad.
Which is exactly why it will climb to the top of the Meme page.
One of Aurelion's lines consists of him saying boop whenever he hits an enemy with a star.
